title: ES6 - var, let and const in depth
description:
In this post we are going to explore the difference between var, let and const. 
      In ES5 we have only one way to declaring variables using var but ES6 gives us two extra 
      keyword to do this let and const.
shortDesc: Learn how to use let and const
author: Rafal Pisarczyk

title: ES6 - arrow function
description:
In this post we are going to explore one of the most interesting and most popular

    Generally it is a new shorter syntax for defining function in javascript.
shortDesc: Learn how to use arrow function
author: Rafal Pisarczyk
